TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChangePasswordDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En un diseñador visual, cuando cambie de origen a la vista Diseño, el código fuente de marcado que describe el control se analiza y se crea una versión en tiempo de diseño del control en la superficie de diseño.In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. Al cambiar a vista de origen, el control de tiempo de diseño se conserva en el código fuente de marcado y editar en el marcado de la página Web.When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework crea internamente una nueva instancia de la cuando se crea el asociado de la clase control o una copia de ese control en la superficie de diseño.The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los elementos de la objeto se deriva el clase y se rellenan a partir de cadenas constantes definidas internamente codificados en XML.The elements of the object are derived from the class and are populated from internally defined XML-encoded constant strings.

summary.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método establece el modo de asociado control, que puede ser una copia, en el modo actual del control real.The method sets the mode of the associated control, which can be a copy, to the current mode of the actual control. A continuación, obliga a los controles secundarios se vuelve a crear y, a continuación, llama al método base para generar el marcado.Next, it forces the child controls to be recreated, and then calls the base method to generate the markup. Si se produce un error, el llamadas la método para generar el marcado para un marcador de posición.If an error occurs, the calls the method to generate the markup for a placeholder.

span.para: Si invalida el método, no olvide de llamar al método base, porque éste llama finalmente el control o una copia del control para generar el marcado.
If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

summary.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El llamadas al método el método para generar el marcado para la representación en tiempo de diseño de la control.The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. También agrega un de objeto para el `regions` parámetro que describe la vista actual de la control.It also adds a object to the `regions` parameter that describes the current view of the control.

span.para: Si invalida el método, no olvide de llamar al método base, porque éste llama finalmente el control o una copia del control para generar el marcado.
If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

summary.span: Gets the persisted form of the current template of the associated control.

span.span: Gets the persisted form of the current template of the associated control.

returns.span: A containing the persisted form of the current template of the associated .

span.span: A containing the persisted form of the current template of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método serializa la plantilla actual (la o propiedad) de la control a su forma persistente, que es un objeto de texto de marcado.The method serializes the current template (the or property) of the control to its persisted form, which is a object of markup text. Este formulario almacenado consta de los controles secundarios serializados que se anexan entre sí.This persisted form consists of the serialized child controls appended together.

summary.span: Gets the markup that renders to a placeholder containing information about the error that occurred while attempting to create or render the associated control at design time.

span.span: Gets the markup that renders to a placeholder containing information about the error that occurred while attempting to create or render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: The markup for the placeholder that contains information about the specified exception.

span.span: The markup for the placeholder that contains information about the specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El marcador de posición contiene los nombres de tipo y el control, un mensaje de error y la propiedad que está asociado el `e` parámetro.The placeholder contains the type and control names, an error message, and the property that is associated with the `e` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements .

summary.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Las llamadas de host del diseñador la método cuando esté listo para usar el diseñador para representar el control.The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. El método y sus métodos base configurar las propiedades y conectar eventos que son necesarios para el funcionamiento del diseñador.The method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. El `component` parámetro es el control que está asociado a este diseñador o una copia del control especificado por `component`.The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the control specified by `component`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Diseñadores de controles utilizan métodos derivados de la método sombrear las diversas propiedades de control con propiedades de tiempo de diseño correspondientes que implementa el diseñador, y para agregar o quitar propiedades en la **propiedades**cuadrícula.Control designers use methods derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. Para el control, el método establece el atribuir a `false` para las propiedades que no se aplican a las plantillas (los quita de la **propiedades** cuadrícula) cuando ha sido una plantilla de usuario definido.For the control, the method sets the attribute to `false` for properties that do not apply to templates (removes them from the **Properties** grid) when a user template has been defined.

span.para: Invalidar el método para agregar propiedades o cambiar los atributos de las propiedades de la colección de propiedades de tiempo de diseño. Asegúrese de llamar al método base antes de realizar otro procesamiento.
Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderOuterTable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RenderOuterTable : bool with get, set

summary.span: Specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.

span.span: Specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.

value.span: Si el control utiliza un contenedor de tablas externas para aplicar reglas de estilo CSS en línea; en caso contrario, .

span.span: if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El control usa un contenedor de tablas externas para aplicar la regla de estilo en línea en el marcado.The control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup. Puede quitar el contenedor de tablas externas al establecer esta propiedad en true.You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to true. Cuando se quita la tabla externa, proporciona mayor flexibilidad en cómo se aplican las reglas de CSS en el marcado que representa el control.Removing the outer table gives you greater flexibility in how you apply CSS rules to the markup that is rendered by the control.

summary.span: Sets the value of a template of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método establece una región modificable en un diseñador para un control o una plantilla que se especifica en su formulario almacenado por el `content` parámetro.The method sets an editable region in a designer to a control or template that is specified in its persisted form by the `content` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El construcciones de propiedades de un de objeto y lo rellena con la colección devuelta por la propiedad base.The property constructs a object and populates it with the collection returned by the base property. A continuación, agrega un objeto para cada una de las plantillas ( y ) del asociado control.It then adds a object for each of the templates ( and ) of the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Dado que el propiedad siempre es `true`, el diseñador utiliza una control que contiene una copia temporal del asociado control para generar el marcado en tiempo de diseño.Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. El control no afecta a la persistencia del .The control does not affect any persistence for the . Si el propiedad se invalidan para devolver `false`, el diseñador utilizaría asociado para generar el marcado en tiempo de diseño.If the property were overridden to return `false`, the designer would use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup.

span.para: Puede invalidar el propiedad para devolver o para determinar su valor en función de si el control está marcado con un nivel de clase objeto. Si el no se reemplaza el objeto omite el .
You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level object. If the is not overridden, the object ignores the .
